name: civics_data
description: Get political representatives for U.S. address from Google Civic Information API

scripts.pyvenv: python3 -m pip install --user --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install --user virtualenv && cd src/backend/scrapeImgUrl && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.fetchreps:
printf 'Express fetch reps server running on port 3050...
' && pm2 start src/backend/fetchReps/fetchRepsServer.js
scripts.scraperepimages:
printf 'Flask image scraper running on port 1235...
' && cd src/backend/scrapeImgUrl && . venv/bin/activate && pm2 start start.sh --name=scrapeRepImages

author: Jeffrey Valcher
